translations: 定陵（明朝皇帝朱翊钧和皇后孝端、孝靖的寝陵）；鼎铃

sentences.sentence: Dingling - the only one of the Ming Tombs excavated so far.
sentences.translation: 定陵，到目前为止唯一出土的明朝陵墓。

sentences.sentence: They walked into Dingling and were surprised at the wonders.
sentences.translation: 他们走进定陵，对那里的奇观感到很惊奇。

sentences.sentence: Dingling is the only one of the 13 Ming tombs excavated so far.
sentences.translation: 定陵是明十三陵中至今惟一挖掘出的陵墓。
